subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Washington’s Alex Ovechkin is leading the charge for the N.H.L. to keep playing in the Olympics when it goes to Sochi, Russia, in 2014, even threatening to go if the league does not.
snippet: Washington’s Alex Ovechkin is leading the charge for the N.H.L. to keep playing in the Olympics when it goes to Sochi, Russia, in 2014, even threatening to go if the league does not.
